name: Luggers
description:
Hello there and welcome ! 

Luggers was made for the Brackeys GameJam 2021.1. It is a game only playable by 2 players (or one with two controllers) locally. 

In Luggers, you will have to get through 4 EPIC puzzles, you will need to use your arms and strength to reach the end of the castle. 

You want to play with your friend who's at his home ?

No. Problem. You just have to download Parsec and connect with your friend, he can now virtually plug his controller (or keyboard) in your computer and you can play (stronger) together ! :)

CONTROLS:

Action ==> KEYBOARD/MOUSE ==> GAMEPAD

  • L.U.G / THROW ==> E ==> South Button
  • Put down ==> F ==> East Button
  • Movement ==> WASD ==> Left Stick
  • Lock mouse ==> Left Alt ==> -----
  • Camera rotation ==> Mouse ==> Right Stick

How to play ?

First, you need to be 2. Either you with yourself (keyboard + gamepad alone).

Either you with your FRIEND ! But you can not start the game if you only see the red player on the main menu :(

Try out the parsec way ! :)

SECOND, if you ever get stucked in a level, I'm sorry... You have to go back to the main menu (via the pause menu ;) ), rebind the players to the controllers (make'em spawn), and hit 'Continue' which should have saved to your furthest level reached.

Third, HAVE FUN ! It is not a huge game, it's really short, bugged in many ways, but hey, YOU CAN THROW YOUR FRIEND OUT ! that's pretty damn funny.

Have fun discovering our really small game, we really hope it makes you have a laugh !

Take care !

Sylver & Pantoine (you can find us on the brackeys discord!)
